content: the love bear snuggler has a big heart that starts out as a granny square this adorable bear snuggler crochet pattern is perfect for cuddling or for carrying along on the next adventure this pattern was designed as part of the furls blog hop 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch treble_crochet crocheting in the round increasing starting with the magic magic_ring embellishing with embroidery back stitch includes links to video tutorials joining with whipstitch seam crocheting over yarn tails includes video tutorials special stitch invdec includes written description and link to video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 14 35 5 cm tall when assembled **materials** furls wander 3 yarn 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 120 yd/109 m 2 skeins in patina ca and 1 skein each in atlantis cb and dragonfruit cc *or approximately 160 yd 146 m in ca 75 yd 68 5 m in cb and 20 yd 18 5 m in cc in any smooth medium weight yarn* furls blush streamline metal 4 us size f-5/3 75 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* stitch markers yarn needle fiber filling safety eyes - 1 pair **gauge** through round 7 in pattern for feet or head = 2 75 7 cm diameter *exact gauge is not critical for this project stitches should be small so fiber filling doesn t show through* 1 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1866551&u=940290&m=116536&urllink=furlscrochet%2ecom%2fblogs%2feverything%2delse&afftrack= 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/05/27/love-bear-snuggler-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //shrsl com/4wdmw 4 https //shrsl com/4wdn2
